title: Don't Look Now
description: A pair of grief stricken parents and a strange set of psychic sisters whose vision of future tragedy goes unrecognized; a young girl who attempts to fulfill her dead father's wishes and thereby discover the horrifying truth about her own past; an engineer who becomes involved in an experiment that seeks to answer the riddle of Death and the secret of Life...These are some of the facinating characters whose macabre adventures unfold with gripping suspense in this new, spellbinding bestseller by Daphne du Maurier. Chilling and compelling, their stories are full of intricately woven drama and stark visions!
author: Daphne du Maurier
